div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Import all the codes that are contained in eHDSI Exceptional Value
Import all the codes that are contained in eHDSI Blood Group
Import all the codes that are contained in eHDSI Presence Absence
Import all the codes that are contained in eHDSI Microorganism

title.value: eHDSI Results Coded Value Laboratory with exceptions

description.value: The Value Set is used to code the value of laboratory observation result. It is defined as the union of: (a) eHDSIBloodGroup (b) eHDSIPresenceAbsence (c) eHDSIMicroorganism (d) eHDSIExceptionalValue
